verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> by the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> at <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H6680>"Command<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that they <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> of the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of their <S%H272>possession<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> to dwell <S%H3427>in;<s%> and you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> for the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> them to the <S%H3881>Levites.<s%>

The <S%H5892>cities<s%> shall they have to dwell <S%H3427>in;<s%> and their <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> shall be for their <S%H929>livestock,<s%> and for their <S%H7399>substance,<s%> and for all their <S%H2416>animals.<s%>

"The <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities,<s%> which you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> shall be from the <S%H7023>wall<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> and <S%H2351>outward<s%> one <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> around <S%H5439>it.<s%>

You shall <S%H4058>measure<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> for the <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and for the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and for the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and for the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> being in the <S%H8432>midst.<s%> This shall be to them the <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

"The <S%H5892>cities<s%> which you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> they shall be the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge,<s%> which you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> for the <S%H7523>manslayer<s%> to <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H5414>to:<s%> and besides them you shall give <S%H705>forty<s%> - <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>
All the <S%H5892>cities<s%> which you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall be <S%H705>forty<s%> - <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> together with their <S%H4054>suburbs.<s%>

Concerning the <S%H5892>cities<s%> which you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> of the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> from the <S%H7227>many<s%> you shall take <S%H7227>many;<s%> and from the <S%H4592>few<s%> you shall take <S%H4592>few:<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> which he <S%H5157>inherits<s%> shall <S%H5414>give<s%> of his <S%H5892>cities<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites.<s%>"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H5674>them,<s%> 'When you pass over the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%>

then you shall <S%H7136>appoint<s%> you <S%H5892>cities<s%> to be <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%> for <S%H7523>you,<s%> that the manslayer who <S%H5221>kills<s%> any <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H7684>unwittingly<s%> may flee <S%H5127>there.<s%>

The <S%H5892>cities<s%> shall be to you for <S%H4733>refuge<s%> from the <S%H1350>avenger,<s%> that the <S%H7523>manslayer<s%> not <S%H4191>die,<s%> until he <S%H5975>stands<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> for <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>
The <S%H5892>cities<s%> which you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> shall be for you <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge.<s%>

You shall <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan;<s%> they shall be <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge.<s%>

For the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and for the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> and for the <S%H1616>foreigner<s%> living <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H8337>them,<s%> shall these six <S%H5892>cities<s%> be for <S%H4733>refuge;<s%> that everyone who <S%H5221>kills<s%> any <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H7684>unwittingly<s%> may flee <S%H5127>there.<s%>

<S%H5221><s%>"'But if he struck him with an <S%H3627>instrument<s%> of <S%H1270>iron,<s%> so that he <S%H4191>died,<s%> he is a <S%H7523>murderer:<s%> the <S%H7523>murderer<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

If he <S%H5221>struck<s%> him with a <S%H68>stone<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand,<s%> by which a man may <S%H4191>die,<s%> and he <S%H4191>died,<s%> he is a <S%H7523>murderer:<s%> the <S%H7523>murderer<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

Or if he <S%H5221>struck<s%> him with a <S%H3627>weapon<s%> of <S%H6086>wood<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand,<s%> by which a man may <S%H4191>die,<s%> and he <S%H4191>died,<s%> he is a <S%H7523>murderer:<s%> the <S%H7523>murderer<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>
The avenger of <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall himself put the <S%H7523>murderer<s%> to <S%H4191>death:<s%> when <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H6293>meets<s%> <S%H1931>him,<s%> he shall put him to <S%H4191>death.<s%>
If he <S%H1920>thrust<s%> him of <S%H8135>hatred,<s%> or <S%H7993>hurled<s%> at <S%H6660>him,<s%> lying in wait, so that he <S%H4191>died,<s%>

or in <S%H342>enmity<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> him with his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> so that he <S%H4191>died;<s%> he who <S%H5221>struck<s%> him shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death;<s%> he is a <S%H7523>murderer:<s%> the <S%H1350>avenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall put the <S%H7523>murderer<s%> to <S%H4191>death,<s%> when he meets <S%H6293>him.<s%>
<S%H1920><s%>"'But if he thrust him <S%H6621>suddenly<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H342>enmity,<s%> or <S%H7993>hurled<s%> on him <S%H3627>anything<s%> without lying in <S%H6660>wait,<s%>

or with any <S%H68>stone,<s%> by which a man may <S%H4191>die,<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7200>seeing<s%> <S%H5307>him,<s%> and cast it on <S%H4191>him,<s%> so that he died, and he was not his <S%H341>enemy,<s%> neither <S%H1245>sought<s%> his <S%H7451>harm;<s%>
then the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> between the <S%H5221>striker<s%> and the <S%H1350>avenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%> according to these <S%H4941>ordinances;<s%>

and the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall <S%H5337>deliver<s%> the <S%H7523>manslayer<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1350>avenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall <S%H7725>restore<s%> him to his <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge,<s%> where he was <S%H5127>fled:<s%> and he shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein until the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest,<s%> who was <S%H4886>anointed<s%> with the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8081>oil.<s%>
<S%H7523><s%>"'But if the manslayer shall at any <S%H3318>time<s%> <S%H3318>go<s%> beyond the <S%H1366>border<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge,<s%> where he <S%H5127>flees,<s%>

and the <S%H1350>avenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> him <S%H2351>outside<s%> of the <S%H1366>border<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge,<s%> and the <S%H1350>avenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H7523>kill<s%> the <S%H7523>manslayer;<s%> he shall not be guilty of <S%H1818>blood,<s%>

because he should have <S%H3427>remained<s%> in his <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%> until the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest:<s%> but <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> the <S%H7523>manslayer<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of his <S%H272>possession.<s%>
<S%H2708><s%>"'These things shall be for a statute and <S%H4941>ordinance<s%> to you throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%> in all your <S%H4186>dwellings.<s%>

<S%H5221><s%>"'Whoever kills any <S%H5315>person,<s%> the <S%H7523>murderer<s%> shall be <S%H7523>slain<s%> at the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H5707>witnesses:<s%> but <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> shall not <S%H6030>testify<s%> against any <S%H5315>person<s%> that he <S%H4191>die.<s%>

<S%H3947><s%>"'Moreover you shall take no <S%H3724>ransom<s%> for the <S%H5315>life<s%> of a <S%H7523>murderer<s%> who is <S%H7563>guilty<s%> of <S%H4191>death;<s%> but he shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

<S%H3947><s%>"'You shall take no <S%H3724>ransom<s%> for him who is <S%H5127>fled<s%> to his <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge,<s%> that he may come <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> until the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

<S%H2610><s%>"'So you shall not pollute the <S%H776>land<s%> in which you <S%H1818>are:<s%> for blood, it <S%H2610>pollutes<s%> the <S%H776>land;<s%> and no <S%H3722>expiation<s%> can be made for the <S%H776>land<s%> for the <S%H1818>blood<s%> that is <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>therein,<s%> but by the blood of him who shed <S%H8210>it.<s%>

You shall not <S%H2930>defile<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> which you <S%H3427>inhabit,<s%> in the midst of <S%H8432>which<s%> I <S%H7931>dwell:<s%> for <S%H3068>I,<s%> Yahweh, <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H8432>in<s%> the midst of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>'"
